page.title: 18Clubs Newton area
page.content: Of the five villages covered in this area only two of which have any clubs to offer to their inhabitants: {Newton {and Dunham.}Both have their own Women's Institute,Youth Club and Dunham has a Senior Citizens Club.Dunham W.I. comprising about 40 members meets in its own hall once monthly, where speakers are heard, Institute matters attended and events organised. It also boasts a competent rounders team. Newton W.I. run along the same lines also meets monthly Membership is half that of Dunham and they meet in Newton School.Each Youth Club meets every Wednesday although Newton caters for a younger age group.Activities suitable for these age groups are organised by club leaders.Dunham Senior Citizens Clubgives those over retirement age an opportunity to meet each other.
